text: Welcome to the French Riviera. This is Nice, the capital of the
French Riviera. Oh my goodness. It is absolutely stunning here.
I am so excited for today...laying on a beach.
So there are two different types of beaches here on French
Riviera or Nice in particular, there's private and then there is
pubic beaches. The public beaches as you can see behind me
are just sand, rocks, kind of free and then there is all these
little cabana huts things that you can pay to sit in.
So we are lazy, well not lazy, I think we made the right choice
We decided to get private beach launge chair. So here is our
private beach that we have. It's amazing.
It cost us 20 Euros, which comes with 1 drink service, which is
amazing, and free wi-fi, and our own washroom, which doesn't
sound like its that important, but trust me, it's pretty important.
How was your pina colada? I didn't have one, but this is pretty
awesome. I didn't get anything yet. I will, don't worry a Drink
because it's only noon. It's only 12.
There is so many, there is so much boobies.
There is so many boobies on the beach here like French people
are crazy, they just go topless. And they don't care.
I am so immature, I am so immature, oh my gosh.
So right now we stopped at the Fragonard perfumery
to learn about the different types of perfume and to buy some
amazing perfumes from France. It's what you call in French
This is Eau de Toilette, it is written eau and that means water.
The formula contains water. The bottle is bigger so you can
spray in quantity. Eau de Toilette is made 10% of aromatic oil,
alcohol and water to dilute. If you read on the bottle Eau de
Parfum, is 15% oil, alcohol and water. The best quality you buy
from the stores is Parfum and it is the most expensive product
that is why we buy Parfum for special occations and to just use
everyday we buy Eau de Toilette because it is more affordable
Parfum: this is 24% essential oil and alcohol, no water. That
means if you try parfum on, you know it is oily compared to Eau
de Toilette, that is why I recomment to spray only on the skin,
not the clothing because it stains.
It's called Ile d'Amour, island of love, but it's really differrent
from No1, it is really citrusy. This one is oceany.
Smells so good. Not a good day to start to get a cold.
If it looks like this in French, Juste un Baiser, that means
Beautiful.
Just One Kiss. Very exotic, because it contains vanilla and
coconut, even a touch of chocolate.
Oh my. It smells so good.
Oh my gosh. I smell amazing. Seriously, I wish you guys could
smell me right now. because I smell fantastic.
